headline.main: U.S. PILOT RESCUES 6 STRANDED FLIERS; Saves Crew of Bomber That Had Been Forced Down Near Gabes Following Raid

lead_paragraph: UNITED STATES ARMY AIR FORCES HEADQUARTERS, in North Africa, Dec. 1 -- (Delayed) -- (U.P.) -- One of the most daring feats of the North African campaign was credited today to an American pilot who landed his plane last night near Gabes and rescued the crew of a United States bomber that had been forced down after having raided that Axis-held Tunisian port.
abstract: US pilot Lt Hawel rescues 6 other US fliers forced down near Gabes following raid

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST FRONT
